shlok_hindi: प्रकाशं च प्रवृत्तिं च मोहमेव च पाण्डव ।
न द्वेष्टि सम्प्रवृत्तानि न निवृत्तानि काङ्क्षति ॥ १४-२२॥
shlok_hinglish: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca mohameva ca pāṇḍava
na dveṣṭi sampravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati 14-22
shlok_english: The Blessed Lord said: Light, activity, and delusion, when present, O Pandava, he hates not, nor longs for them when absent.

defs.meaning: the Supreme Personality of Godhead said
